description:
Uh oh!  Dot went exploring in the woods and got lost!  Looks like Dot will have to spend the night in Castle Creepenstein.  
Let's help Dot to wake up for any spooky sounds.

hints.description: Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After falling asleep, make Dot automatically turn off the eye lights. Then make Dot automatically turn the lights off.
After turning the lights off, make Dot wake up when a clap is heard. Then make Dot automatically turn on yellow lights.

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the Wake Up state using a Clap Heard cue. Link the Wake Up state to the Yellow light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot wait for 5.0 s then fall asleep again.
puzzles.introduction: Hmmm.  I don't hear it anymore.  It must have been the wind.

hints.description: Link the states with a Wait For cue set to 5.0 s.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot say "Wait, who goes there?" when Dot hears a clap or hears a voice.

hints.description: Link the states with a Clap Heard cue and a Voice Heard cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dot turn on all eye lights when a voice is heard. Then make Dot automatically say "Wait, who goes there?"

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the Eye Ring with all of the eye lights on using a Voice Heard cue. Link the same eye ring to the sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Wait, who goes there?", make Dot instantly turn on red lights. Then make Dot wait for 5.0 s before falling asleep again.

hints.description: Link the sound to the Red light using an Instant cue. Link the Red light to the Fall Asleep state using a Wait For cue set to 5.0 s.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot play the siren sound when Dot hears a clap or hears a voice. Then make Dot automatically say "Ha, hah!"
puzzles.introduction: If there are too many creepy sounds, Dot should sound an alarm and surprise any intruders!

hints.description: Link the Red light to the Siren sound using Clap Heard and Voice Heard cues. Link the Siren sound to the "Ha, hah!" sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After Dot says "Ha, hah!", make Dot say "You shush!" when the top button is pressed. Then make Dot automatically fall asleep again.
puzzles.introduction: Dot's going to give this noisy castle a little advice!

hints.description: Link the "Ha, hah!" sound to the "You shush!" sound using a Top Button Pressed cue. Link the "You shush!" sound to the Fall Asleep state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot listen for sounds in Castle Creepenstein. Make Dot sound the alarm three times.
puzzles.introduction: We can sleep tight tonight with Dot on the night watch!
